Index.meta_description: An easy way to manage your academy.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You do not have the permissions to perform this action

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.meta_description: An easy way to manage your academy.

Billing.current_section_description: Adjust your payment plan to best suit your requirements

CheckoutConfirmation.message_state_description: Your payment has been successfully processed. Thank you for your purchase!

Todos.title_bar_description: View and manage your todo list

AddTodo.add_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to create a new todo

EditTodo.edit_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to edit the todo

TodoForm.title_description: Enter a descriptive title for your todo.
TodoForm.title_error_message: Title is required and cannot be empty
TodoForm.message_description: Enter a detailed message for your todo.
TodoForm.message_error_message: Message is required and cannot be empty

Staff.access_denied_message: You do not have permission to view the staff list. Only organization administrators can access this page.
Staff.no_results_found: No staff members match your search

InviteStaffModal.title: Invite Staff Member
InviteStaffModal.info_message: An invitation email will be sent to the staff member with instructions to create their account and access this location. Permissions are determined by the selected role.
InviteStaffModal.validation_error: Please fill in all required fields.
InviteStaffModal.submit_error: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.
InviteStaffModal.email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
InviteStaffModal.invitation_sent_success: Invitation sent successfully! The staff member will receive an email with instructions to join.
InviteStaffModal.edit_info_message: Update the staff member's information below.

MemberTypeStep.title: Choose Member Type
MemberTypeStep.subtitle: Select the type of member you want to add
MemberTypeStep.individual_description: You are signing up one individual member. They can add family members later.
MemberTypeStep.family_member_description: This member has a head of household pay for them.
MemberTypeStep.head_of_household_description: This member pays for family members to train.

MemberPhotoStep.title: Add Member Photo
MemberPhotoStep.subtitle: Upload a profile photo (optional)
MemberPhotoStep.drop_text: Drop your image here to upload
MemberPhotoStep.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Please use JPG, PNG, or GIF.

MemberMembershipStep.title: Choose Membership Plan
MemberMembershipStep.subtitle: Select a membership plan for this member
MemberMembershipStep.no_plans_available: No membership plans available. Please create membership plans first.

MemberPaymentStep.payment_description: This signs up this member for a {plan} recurring membership. They will be charged {amount} every {period} on this day until they cancel.
MemberPaymentStep.ach_account_holder_error: Please enter an account holder name.
MemberPaymentStep.payment_approved_message: The payment has been successfully processed. You can now proceed to complete member registration.
MemberPaymentStep.payment_declined_continue_message: You can still continue adding this member. Their status will be set to "Inactive" and marked as "Past Due" until payment is successfully processed.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_insufficient_funds: The card has insufficient funds. Please try a different payment method.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_invalid_cvc: The CVC/CVV code is incorrect. Please verify and try again.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_expired_card: The card has expired. Please use a valid card.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_card_declined: The card was declined. Please try a different payment method.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_ach_failed: The ACH transaction failed. Please verify the account details and try again.
MemberPaymentStep.decline_reason_generic: The payment could not be processed. Please try again or use a different payment method.

MemberSuccessStep.title: Success
MemberSuccessStep.description: {name} has successfully been added as a member. They will receive an email at the email address provided confirming their membership.
MemberSuccessStep.email_confirmation: A confirmation email will be sent to {email}

ClassBasicsStep.title: Class Basics
ClassBasicsStep.subtitle: Enter the basic information for this class
ClassBasicsStep.max_capacity_help: Maximum number of students per class
ClassBasicsStep.min_age_help: Minimum age to attend this class
ClassBasicsStep.description_placeholder: Describe what students will learn in this class...

ClassScheduleStep.title: Schedule Details
ClassScheduleStep.subtitle: Set up the class schedule and assign instructors
ClassScheduleStep.no_instances_message: No schedule instances added yet. Add time slots to define when this class meets.
ClassScheduleStep.instances_error: Please add at least one schedule instance.

ClassTagsStep.title: Add Tags
ClassTagsStep.subtitle: Select tags to categorize this class
ClassTagsStep.no_tags_selected: No tags selected. Click tags below to add them.
ClassTagsStep.all_tags_selected: All available tags have been selected.
ClassTagsStep.tags_help: Tags help members find classes and organize your schedule.
ClassTagsStep.calendar_color_help: Use the color picker or enter a hex code, e.g., #ff0000 = red

ClassSuccessStep.title: Class Created!
ClassSuccessStep.description: {name} has been successfully created and added to your schedule.

MyProfile.title: My Profile
MyProfile.profile_update_error: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

Preferences.title: Preferences
Preferences.communication_emails_description: Receive an email when a member messages you through Dojo Planner.
Preferences.member_change_emails_description: Receive an email whenever a new member is added, or a change happens to an existing member.
Preferences.financial_transaction_emails_description: Receive an email when financial transactions such as membership payments and purchases are logged.
Preferences.announcements_description: Receive the latest news and special offers from Dojo Planner
Preferences.communication_texts_description: Receive a text when a member messages you through Dojo Planner.
Preferences.member_change_texts_description: Receive a text whenever a new member is added, or a change happens to an existing member.
Preferences.financial_transaction_texts_description: Receive a text when financial transactions such as membership payments and purchases are logged.
Preferences.danger_zone_warning: Warning: you may miss important information if you turn off all notifications.
Preferences.appearance_description: Appearance settings will be available soon.
Preferences.billing_description: Billing settings will be available soon.
Preferences.data_export_description: Data export settings will be available soon.

DeleteProgramAlertDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeleteProgramAlertDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your program and remove the data from the servers.

DeleteCouponAlertDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeleteCouponAlertDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{couponCode}" coupon and remove the data from the servers.

DeleteMembershipAlertDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeleteMembershipAlertDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{membershipName}" membership and remove the data from the servers.

DeleteClassAlertDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeleteClassAlertDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the "{className}" class and remove the data from the servers.
